mean_cn: v. 退休；  adj. 退休的，不善社交的，过隐居生活的
mean_en: used to describe a person who will be retiring from a job or profession soon
sentence: They had worked hard their whole lives and now they are happy to be retiring.
sentence_trans: 他们已经辛苦工作了大半辈子，现在他们高兴的准备退休。
word_etyma: retir=retire退休 + ing形容词后缀 → retiring退休的
